pkgmetadata.longdescription: Resource Selection (Probability) Functions for Use-Availability Data // Resource Selection (Probability) Functions for use- availability wildlife data based on weighted distributions as described in Lele and Keim (2006) doi:10.1890/0012-9658(2006)87%5B3021:WDAEOR%5D2.0.CO;2, Lele (2009) doi:10.2193/2007-535, and Solymos Lele (2016) doi:10.1111/2041-210X.12432.
